extendedInfo.description: [Caution]This application is compatible only with LG Smart TVs which are released in 2011. Application("LG TV Remote") for smart TV Models released in 2012(not listed in supported models) has been uploaded.When a smart phone and LG TV are connected via router, after a simple pairing process, LG TV may be controlled conveniently with the smart phone similar to a regular or a Magic Motion remote controller.[Network Settings on TV]- To get started, connect your LG TV through wired/wireless router to TV LAN port.- Go to Home Dash Board [SETUP] -> [NETWORK] -> Configure settings in [Network Setting].[Network Settings on Android Phone]- [Settings] -> Configure Settings in [Wireless & networks].** Please ensure that the Smart Phone is connected to the same network as that of your LG TV.[Supported models]LED LZ9600 Series Higher @ TV 2011(Model Code Starts with LZ9)LED LW 5500 Series Higher @ TV 2011(Model Code Starts with LW5)LED LV 5500 Series Higher @ TV 2011(Model Code Starts with LV3)LED LV 3700 Series, (LV372S/ LV373S/ LV375S/ LV3700)Except for Model Code Starts with LK[Main Features]VOL/CH: Change volume or channel.Touchpad: Control pointer on TV by touching the touchpad screen on a smart phone.Button: Use direction keys to navigate TV menus or to control media playback.Setting: Connect TV, edit TV name, touchpad sensitivity, set vibration or sound effects.Mute for incoming call: Mutes TV for incoming call.My CH: Manage My channel list in smart phone.Promotional Video- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pam2ZtPw0N4

reviews.title: Poor Apps
reviews.comment: This application doesn\'t work with my 2011 LG TV, model 42LW650T.ZC. Both my Samsung Slll and the TV have up-to-date software. Can someone let me know wat l need to do. Thanks
reviews.author: Olajuwon Odunsi

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I tried this and it is awesome. I can now troll arouns with my brother with this awesome app.
reviews.author: Angus Li

reviews.title: friend
reviews.comment: Guys,  I have a Samsung Galaxy S3 smartphone and a 47LW5700 LG TV from 2011. I installed this app and it did not worked at the beginning, showing the dotted screen on the TV and no password. I have two networks at home with several computers and devices connected to them. I checked the connections of both the TV and the phone and realized that they were connected to different networks. I adjusted that and it worked perfectly, both on the same network. Hope this to be helpful for you all
reviews.author: Pedro Garcia

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Update fixed issues on Galaxy S3, the app is working now. 1-6-13  Graphics and touch areas do not match on this phone\'s hi-res display.  Force closes many times because of it.  Worked great in the HTC Droid Incredible 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Used to work perfect before update bow tv see\'s connection but phone wants to re-scan on my HTC desire hd.please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App works but one Caveat
reviews.comment: Honestly this works quite well and is very useful, however one issue with it regards my TV itself. It seems as if you need to conduct a network test before attempting to connect with the phone application. Scanning before doing so yields no results, but scanning after a network test has the application successfully connecting to the phone.
reviews.author: Jeff Snell

reviews.title: Stupid program
reviews.comment: Seriously, it\'s not that hard to include an option to specify the IP address of the TV. Having to bridge the wired network to the wifi one creates unnecessary security issues.  The failure to permit specifying an IP address makes this app useless.
reviews.author: Troy Rollo

reviews.title: Beauty
reviews.comment: Finally, compatible with tablets! I got the coolest remote control!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Text input missing...
reviews.comment: A good app but lacks the ability type text directly from device as prior to the update. Please add this important feature and I will give 5 stars.
reviews.author: N Lambrinos

reviews.title: works well
reviews.comment: installed on a Samsung galaxy 2 and a HTC xfire 1, controls TV fantastically through router,,  very easy to pair, now installing it onto a Asus tf300
reviews.author: Bradley Murphy

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Edit channel name seems to be broken.  Would be nice if pairing was quicker or not necessary every time I start the app.

reviews.title: Magic remote
reviews.comment: I find all what I need and doing the same or more than the normal remote. I\'m using my galaxy S. definitely recomanded

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: With last update it works with nexus 7. When I add channel in my channels I can\'t rename it
reviews.author: Kaloyan Danchev

reviews.title: Amazing with an Samsung phone
reviews.comment: Worlds like a dream from heaven even though it don\'t exist.
reviews.author: Ash Frend

reviews.title: Simple not working
reviews.comment: Is LG full of idiots never improving? This app is not complicated social media app. It\'s just remote control. I don\'t understand why it takes so long just to make it work.
reviews.author: Jinsoo Kim

reviews.title: Acer Iconia B1
reviews.comment: Unfortunately this does not work with my 2012 LG 42LM620S but the original LG TV Remote does.  Another issue to watch out for is to make sure that you have a proper wireless network setup and your TV is connected to the network via WiFi and if your TV isn\'t equipped, buy the LG WiFi dongle.  You can pick up one on Amazon or Ebay at a reasonable price.  The final connection option is via network cable  if you have wired capability.    So answer is if it doesn\'t work, try all versions. I am going to state the obvious rule of thumb, no, RJ45 LAN socket (required to be connected to your wireless hub directly or by network), no WiFi, not compatible with the LG dongle and no USB it won\'t work at all.
reviews.author: Mark D

reviews.title: Great improvement
reviews.comment: This app actually works longer than a few seconds like the old app.  You can actually use it as a full replacement remote now.
reviews.author: Terry Richards

reviews.title: Not impressive
reviews.comment: After this recent update, it stops working and keeps crashing. Desire HD
reviews.author: Bernard Mercado

reviews.title: it works once you get past the pairing mode
reviews.comment: I drilled through the users manual on my 55LW5600 and searched the web only to find nothing.  I finally began entering bogus pairing numbers out of frustration when all of a sudden, the actual pairing number popped up on the bottom right hand corner of tv screen on my LG.  after entering the correct pairing number into the app, it synchs right up.   Honestly, after playing around, I find this app pretty useless for my needs.  I use ATT Uverse & a Bose Sound System.  The only time I would need this app is to switch from the BluRay back to ATT Uverse and vice versa.   Although this app really doesn\'t fit my needs, I still give it 5 out of 5 stars because it works exactly how it says it works and does it well.
reviews.author: Michael Miller

reviews.title: Update provides useless junk
reviews.comment: Worked fine before now won\'t even find my LG TV on the network.  Honestly do you guys even check these apps before you send out an update? If you would just provide a way to manually enter the TVs IP address then everything will be just fine.  I know it\'s this poorly written app because everything else in my system that uses a remote app works perfectly.  If I could give it zero stars I would.  Update 8/8/2013 if I reset the TV it will connect but fails again when the TV is turned off/on.  EPIC FAIL!
reviews.author: Carl Montney
